entry.title: SPECIAL AIR QUALITY STATEMENT , Edmonton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:41 PM MST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -13.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Edmonton Blatchford 8:00 PM MST Thursday 12 January 2023
Temperature: -13.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.7 kPa falling
Humidity: 82 %
Wind Chill: -16
Dewpoint: -15.6°C
Wind: SE 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 6.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 12 January 2023
